# SPIKERS Website - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains a static website for the SPIKERS project.

## Project Overview
A responsive static website built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

## Key Files
- `index.html` - Main structure and content
- `styles.css` - Responsive design and styling
- `script.js` - Interactive features and smooth scrolling

## Customization Guidelines
1. Update content in `index.html` (replace placeholder text and descriptions)
2. Modify colors by editing CSS variables in `styles.css`
3. Add new sections by duplicating existing section structure
4. Update contact email and social links in footer

## Development Tips
- Use a local server to view changes (Python: `python -m http.server 8000`)
- Test responsive design using browser DevTools
- All styling is mobile-first and responsive
- No external dependencies required

## Future Enhancements
- Add contact form with backend
- Integrate CMS for content management
- Add image assets and media
- Implement SEO optimization
- Add dark mode theme toggle
